Summary: Completion of the Development of Public Spaces in the Marsh Sector of the Zac of the First Operational Sector of the Banks of the Haute Deûle in Lille - Lomme - Lot No. 5 Wastewater. Description: Lot n°5 is dedicated to the reinforcement of the existing pumping station on avenue Marie-Louise Delwaulle in Lille and the deployment of a new wastewater network on quai Hegel between rue Victor Hugo and allée Julie Victoire Daubié in Lomme. The duration overall execution of lot 5 Wastewater is 18 months from the date set by the service order which will prescribe the start of the services. The contract is allocated. The description of the works and their technical specifications are indicated in the specific technical clauses (C.C.T.P.). Place of execution of the works: Marais sector - ZAC of the 1st sector of Rives de la Haute Deûle in Lille-Lomme The lot includes a single firm section with four distinct phases: Phase 1: Reinforcement of Delwaulle StationPhase 2: Preparatory work - Opening of excavations for the purpose of moving networks by concessionairesPhase 3: Deployment of the EU network between alley J.V.Daubié and the intersection of rue NotebartPhase 4: Deployment of the EU network between the intersection of rue Notebart and rue Victor Hugo. Published Date: 2025-11-08. Closing Date: 2025-12-18. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SAINT-MAURICE TOWN HALL - MUNICIPALITY OF SAINT-MAURICE. Summary: Maintenance of Sanitation Networks and Equipment in Municipal Buildings. Description: The purpose of the contract is the preventive and curative maintenance of the sanitation networks of municipal facilities in the town of Saint-Maurice. The contract is concluded at mixed prices. All scheduled preventive maintenance services are remunerated by application of a global and fixed price. Additional preventive maintenance interventions and curative maintenance interventions, paid for by application of unit prices, appear in the Unit Price Schedule (BPU). These services will give rise to the establishment of a framework agreement concluded without a minimum annual amount and with a maximum annual amount: 40,000 euros excluding VAT or 160,000 euros excluding VAT overall. The service contract is concluded for an initial period of 12 months and is tacitly renewable 3 times without its maximum duration exceeding 4 years.. Published Date: 2025-11-08. Closing Date: 2025-12-08. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: SAINT-MAURICE TOWN HALL - MUNICIPALITY OF SAINT-MAURICE
output.Summary: Maintenance of Sanitation Networks and Equipment in Municipal Buildings
output.Description: The purpose of the contract is the preventive and curative maintenance of the sanitation networks of municipal facilities in the town of Saint-Maurice. The contract is concluded at mixed prices. All scheduled preventive maintenance services are remunerated by application of a global and fixed price. Additional preventive maintenance interventions and curative maintenance interventions, paid for by application of unit prices, appear in the Unit Price Schedule (BPU). These services will give rise to the establishment of a framework agreement concluded without a minimum annual amount and with a maximum annual amount: 40,000 euros excluding VAT or 160,000 euros excluding VAT overall. The service contract is concluded for an initial period of 12 months and is tacitly renewable 3 times without its maximum duration exceeding 4 years.

instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CITY OF SANNOIS. Summary: Assistance to Project Management Relating to the Appointment of a Development Agent for the Cur De Ville Project in Sannois. Description: As part of the Cur de Ville project, the community wishes to entrust the implementation of the operation to a development agent in 2026, and thus plans to launch a market allowing this to be designated. The development agent who will be selected During 2026, its mission will be to ensure the overall management of the development project. It will be involved in particular in the organization of consultations and the designation of service providers, the monitoring of studies and infrastructure works, as well as the coordination of different actors and partners. He will also monitor the design and implementation of real estate programs, in conjunction with the EPFIF and the operators. In addition, he will take charge of administrative management, financial and regulatory aspects of the operation, will participate in the search for financing and the monitoring of authorization requests. Particular attention will be paid to communication and consultation with stakeholders. To do this, and it This is the subject of this contract, the City is looking for project management assistance who will be responsible for drafting the contract and analyzing the candidates' offers. In this context, the AMO will have the mission of supporting the City in the drafting and analysis of market applications.. Published Date: 2025-11-08. Closing Date: 2025-12-01. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Assistance to Project Management Relating to the Appointment of a Development Agent for the Cur De Ville Project in Sannois
output.Description: As part of the Cur de Ville project, the community wishes to entrust the implementation of the operation to a development agent in 2026, and thus plans to launch a market allowing this to be designated. The development agent who will be selected During 2026, its mission will be to ensure the overall management of the development project. It will be involved in particular in the organization of consultations and the designation of service providers, the monitoring of studies and infrastructure works, as well as the coordination of different actors and partners. He will also monitor the design and implementation of real estate programs, in conjunction with the EPFIF and the operators. In addition, he will take charge of administrative management, financial and regulatory aspects of the operation, will participate in the search for financing and the monitoring of authorization requests. Particular attention will be paid to communication and consultation with stakeholders. To do this, and it This is the subject of this contract, the City is looking for project management assistance who will be responsible for drafting the contract and analyzing the candidates' offers. In this context, the AMO will have the mission of supporting the City in the drafting and analysis of market applications.

Summary: Extension of the Sanitation Network - Gravity Pipes, Discharge and Discharge Station in Rue Des Mouvines in Grézac - 2 Lots. Description: As part of its 2025 program, the Royan Atlantique Urban Community (CARA) has initiated work to extend the collective sanitation network in the town of Grézac. Areas not served by collective sanitation are subject to to the creation of homes highlighting an interest in creating a connection to the collective network accessible nearby. The project consists of creating a gravity network in Rue des Mouvines as well as a pumping station and its network to allow the future connection of existing homes and future projects.. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SPL ARAC OCCITANIE. Summary: Redevelopment and Energy Renovation of the Roger Sudre Nursery School in Revel (31). Description: The Roger Sudre nursery school in REVEL within the school group is a building which brings together 5 classes for a total of around 130 children on a total useful surface area of ​​970m2 for 1200m2 of floor space. The Roger Sudre nursery school was created in the 1960s, and the building has already been the subject of extension and improvement work in the 2000s. An overall renovation is necessary today, both in terms of energy and functionality, as the uses of the spaces have evolved over the years. The project provides for the redevelopment and complete energy renovation of the school kindergarten. The targeted interventions are: a complete cleaning including roof and exterior joinery of the building to preserve only the structure of the building then a complete restructuring floor wall ceiling of the work as well as technical elements (CFO CFA networks, HVAC, double flow CTA, radiators, lighting and various terminals). Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Redevelopment and Energy Renovation of the Roger Sudre Nursery School in Revel (31)

Summary: Technical Project Management Assistance for Ticketing and Traveler Information Projects on all Sytral Mobilites Networks. Description: This consultation concerns a technical project management assistance mission (AMOT) for carrying out changes to the ticketing and passenger information systems of the TCL network. The services are broken down into several types of missions, intended to be triggered gradually needs according to the priorities defined by SYTRAL Mobilites. They relate in particular to: - Assistance in managing developments in the ticketing system; - Assistance with the renewal of hardware and software for the Open Payment service; - Assistance in managing developments in remote sales and passenger information software; - Study and management of the renewal of remote sales and passenger information software; - Assistance in setting up a MAS TCL service This is a framework agreement executed according to the services implemented, by the issue purchase orders and by the conclusion of subsequent contracts in application of articles R2162-2 to R2162-14 of the public procurement code. The framework agreement is concluded for an initial period of 3 year(s) from its date of notification. It is renewable once for a period of 1 year. There overall duration of the framework agreement is 4 years. The renewal is tacit unless an express decision of non-renewal is notified to the service provider at the latest one month before the anniversary date (notification date) of the contract. The holder remains engaged until the end of the execution period in course.... Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-08. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The operation aims to transform the former headquarters of CROUS in Dijon into a shared urban campus intended to accommodate several higher education establishments (Sciences Po, ENSA Dijon, ESM Bourgogne). It includes rehabilitation work, upgrading (accessibility, energy, fire safety), the creation of shared premises, as well as operational governance for post-work management (maintenance, lodge, GTB, common equipment, etc.). (C.C.T.P.).<br> The consultation took the form of an open call for tenders in accordance with article R.2124-2 1 of the public procurement code.<br> Cleaning of parking lots<br> Given the uncertain number of one-off services to be carried out, the contract is a single-awarder framework agreement, which is carried out using purchase orders, within the meaning of articles R2162-4 2, R2162-13 and R2162-14 of the public procurement code. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CROCHET. Summary: Framework Agreement for Relief and Masonry Works Following Amicable Termination of the Initial Contract. Description: This consultation concerns the road and masonry work to be carried out as part of the repair and maintenance operations of the municipal roads of Crocicchia. This contract is a continuation of an operation previously undertaken, the execution of which was interrupted following the amicable termination of the initial contract due to failure of the holder. This consultation aims to ensure the technical resumption of the services necessary for the completion of the project. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CC OF THE GRAND PIC SAINT LOUP. Summary: Rehabilitation and Extension Work on Water and Sanitation Networks. Description: The framework agreement will give rise to the conclusion of subsequent contracts for lot 1 and the issuance of purchase orders for lot 2. Lot 1 will concern the extension and renewal work of the drinking water and sanitation networks for lengths greater than 300 meters and for all work on asbestos networks (drinking water and sanitation) whatever the length. This work will not cover wastewater treatment plants and civil engineering works. Lot 2 will concern the extension and renewal work of drinking water and sanitation networks of less than 300 linear meters, excluding asbestos networks which will be treated in lot 1. The work in this lot will also cover extensions as part of development operations or creation of subdivision.. Published Date: 2025-11-06. Closing Date: 2025-12-04. Competition: ICB. Description: The consultation concerns the following services: Creation of surface coatings on departmental roads - Years 2026 / 2029.<br> The acquisition of services will be carried out by framework agreements with purchase orders without minimum and with a maximum annual amount specific to each lot:<br> - Lot n1: Territorial Planning Service of Autun/Le Creusot: 600,000.00 Euros excluding tax.<br> - Lot n2: Territorial Planning Service of Charolais-Brionnais: 850,000.00 Euros excluding tax.<br> - Lot n3: Territorial Planning Service of Chalonnais: 650,000.00 Euros excluding tax.<br> - Lot n4: Territorial Planning Service from Louhannais: 550,000.00 Euros excluding tax.<br> - Lot n5: Territorial Planning Service of Maconnais: 700,000.00 Euros excluding tax.<br> The maximum number of lots that can be allocated to the same holder is set at two (2), according to the terms defined in article 6 of these consultation regulations.<br> THE contracts awarded by framework agreement with purchase orders will be concluded for a period of one year from January 1, 2026 or from the date of notification if it is later. Summary: Project Management Competition for the Construction of a Center for Introduction to Nature and the Environment (Cine) in Saint-Louis. Description: Restricted competition on "sketch" organized with a view to awarding a project management contract relating to:<br> The construction of a Center for Introduction to Nature and the Environment (CINE) in SAINT-LOUIS.<br> Saint-Louis Agglomeration and the Association of the Petite Camargue Alsacienne, have initiated a reflection on the creation of a reception building at one of the entrance gates to the Petite Camargue Alsacienne nature reserve.<br> The objective is twofold:<br> - Create a building visible from rue de Strasbourg, right at the "strategic" crossroads leading to the nature reserve from the main road (e.g. R.N. 66). It will be an exemplary building in terms of energy saving (capable of reaching passive levels) and thermal comfort. The use of biosourced and geo-sourced materials will be an undeniable asset for this project.<br> - Meet the needs for premises, rooms activities, offices, etc., of the Center for Introduction to Nature and the Environment (CINE), currently cramped and scattered over several locations.<br> Description of services:<br> The share of the financial envelope allocated by the project owner to the work is:<br> 2,108,700.00 euro(s) excluding tax without options, value June 2025.<br> 2,305,000.00 euro(s) excluding tax with options, value June 2025.<br> -Date for sending invitations to participate to selected candidates: Week 10/2026<br> Project management competition for the construction of a Center for Introduction to Nature and the Environment (CINE) in SAINT-.... The work operations concerned are: - Scheduled work operations of the PPI College and the PPI of the Heritage and Logistics Department within the limit of the authorized threshold in a procedure adapted for intellectual services (new works, extension or rehabilitation) - Major additional maintenance work operations (excluding PPI) - Unscheduled work operations that have become necessary (compliance, technical adaptation, adaptation of use, asbestos removal, deconstruction, etc.) - Work operations following a disaster (fire, water damage, damage to structures, etc.) - Prior diagnostics / Technical feasibility Excluded: - Work operations subject to an obligation to provide assistance as well as those requiring a formalized procedure for project management - Major maintenance work operations integrated into the PPI (three-year programming for colleges). The maximum number of lots that can be allocated to the same holder is set at two (2), according to the terms defined in article 6 of these consultation regulations. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: VIENNA CONDRIEU AGGLOMERATION. Summary: Development of Boulevard Du Rhone (Rd 1407). Description: The award procedure used is an open call for tenders subject to the provisions of articles L. 2124-2, R. 2124-2 1 and R. 2161-2 to R. 2161-5 of the Public Procurement Code. The services are divided into 2 lots. Each lot will be the subject of a market. Candidates have the opportunity to submit bids for all lots. The overall time limit for the execution of all services is 15 months including 2 months of site preparation from the date set by service order. This consultation includes execution conditions of a social nature, the details of which is indicated in Appendix 1 of the commitment document for the lots concerned. The project owner decided to implement an approach aimed at promoting employment. The company holding the contract must therefore respect the condition which commits it to reserving an hourly volume of work in favor of one or more person(s) from priority audiences. For the lots concerned, the hourly volumes of work are: - Lot n1: 1,100 hours of insertion - Lot n2: 800 hours of insertion Compliance with these provisions is a condition for the conformity of the offer. An offer containing reservations or not respecting these specific conditions of execution will be declared irregular on the grounds of non-compliance with the specifications. charges. Published Date: 2025-11-06. Closing Date: 2025-11-24. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SEINE-NORTH EUROPE CANAL COMPANY. Summary: Road Restoration Work Rd932 - Rd934. Description: This contract concerns the completion of works and associated services aimed at redeveloping the connection zone between the western bypass of Noyon (RD932) open to traffic in 2021 and the RD934. They are a prerequisite for starting the main works of the construction project of the sector 2 of the Seine-Nord Europe Canal, subject of another contract. The work mainly concerns the following structures: - the RD932 / RD934 / RD934E / VC roundabout with all its beginnings, including that of the RD934 East, - the temporary deviation of the RD934/RD932, including the beginning of the RD934 East, at the existing East roundabout on the RD934, - the RD934 western part, - the VC Vauchelles, - the VC Porquericourt, - the VC Calendes, - two road water treatment basins (BA1215 and BA1225), - hydraulic works on waterways (ru des Combles, ru Chateau Vieville and ru Calendes) and associated derivations. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: PARIS AIRPORTS. Summary: Monitoring the Quality of Rainwater, Wastewater, Industrial Water, Underground Water and the Natural Environment on Aeroports De Paris Platforms. Summary: Reinforcement Works (Protective Rock Embankment) of the Margonajo Jetty Protecting the Charles Ornano/Admiralty Marina in Ajaccio. Description: The services are regulated by unit and fixed prices. The Margonajo pier is an old structure which protects the Charles Ornano marina in Ajaccio. Successive storms have seriously damaged the structure and repairs have been necessary in order to secure the work while awaiting reinforcement work. In order to limit crossings during storms and to secure the marina facilities, reinforcement work is planned. This work consists of the implementation of a protective embankment in riprap from rooting up to the pier head. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-12-09. Competition: ICB. Toulouse Town Hall wishes to reposition and extend this daycare located at 14 Chemin du Mirail in Toulouse. This new project will transform the current daycare center (temporary or occasional reception of the child) into a multi-welcome center (regular, temporary or occasional reception of the child) and increase its reception capacity, allowing an increase from 18 to 30 places

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOWN OF VENISSIEUX. Summary: Rehabilitation and Extension of the Old Town Hall for the Creation of a New Cultural Facility: the Olga Bancic House of Memories. Description: The operation involves the rehabilitation and extension of the Rol-Tanguy house, the former town hall of Venissieux built at the end of the 19th century and today unoccupied, located at 21 place Leon Sublet. The future building will accommodate two exhibition spaces (permanent and temporary), an auditorium, a educational action room and a reception and opening space. The cultural equipment will be dedicated to the history and memory of the town and its inhabitants, and will more particularly highlight certain features constituting the town's identities, such as its horticultural tradition, its engagement during the Second World War, the importance of working history, and the contribution of foreign populations who settled there. This contract includes the work of all trades of rehabilitation and extension as well as the completion of the scenographic development project future equipment. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-12-10. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CITY OF LYON. Summary: Town Hall of the 9Th Arrondissement - Renovation. Description: The project consists of an energy and functional renovation of the town hall of the 9th arrondissement of Lyon. It includes: - Overall energy renovation: replacement of joinery, internal thermal insulation, solar protection, roof repair, renovation of heating and ventilation equipment; - The creation of a permanent reception and a waiting area in the hall; - The functional renovation of services on the lower ground floor, allowing simplification and improving access to services; - The creation of a meeting room and the redevelopment of the spaces on the upper ground floor. The renovation project will take place on an unoccupied site. Certain premises, said to be vital, will however have to remain in functioning. The estimated start date for the work is: 03/13/2026. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: PARIS-PANTHEON-ASSAS UNIVERSITY. Summary: Work Process for the Replacement of Three Elevators at the Assas Center of the Paris-Pantheon-Assas University. Description: The purpose of this contract is the replacement work on three elevators at the Assas university center, 92 rue d'Assas Paris 6th, classified ERP 1st category with activity type L, N and S. The work concerns the replacement of the elevators below : o Duplex elevators building A: ASC 2 Right (HPZ91) of 10 levels and ASC 3 Left (HPZ90) of 11 levels o Library elevator building D: ASC 5 (HPZ92) of 5 levels The market is broken down into a firm tranche relating to the replacement of elevators 2 and 3 of building A Duplex and an optional phase relating to the replacement of elevator 5 Library. The project owner only makes a definitive commitment to the contractor for the amount of the firm tranche. The strengthening of the optional phase of work envisaged for the second half of 2026, will be carried out by decision of the contracting authority notified by registered letter with acknowledgment of receipt. The company undertakes to carry out the work on the firm phase without fail. between June 1, 2026 and September 12, 2026, i.e. a completion time of 15 weeks, excluding the preparation and supply period, with the continued availability of a device outside the period from July 13 to August 29 during which both devices may be unavailable. The contract includes the guarantee of perfect completion.. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2028-12-18. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Work Process for the Replacement of Three Elevators at the Assas Center of the Paris-Pantheon-Assas University

The project owner only makes a definitive commitment to the contractor for the amount of the firm tranche. The strengthening of the optional phase of work envisaged for the second half of 2026, will be carried out by decision of the contracting authority notified by registered letter with acknowledgment of receipt. The company undertakes to carry out the work on the firm phase without fail. between June 1, 2026 and September 12, 2026, i.e. a completion time of 15 weeks, excluding the preparation and supply period, with the continued availability of a device outside the period from July 13 to August 29 during which both devices may be unavailable. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOULOUSE METROPOLE. Summary: 25M0360Aoo - Repair Work on Structuring Roads Using Bituminous Products. Description: This consultation concerns the REFECTION WORK ON THE STRUCTURING ROADS IN BITUMINOUS PRODUCTS - 25M0360AOO This work concerns more precisely the localized repair of sections of the Metropolitan Roads of Toulouse Métropole or roads of similar size and with equivalent natures and volumes of materials, as part of an annual road maintenance campaign using bituminous products: bituminous concrete, grave bitumen, grave emulsion, surface wear coatings, cold-cast bituminous materials and reprocessing in place with hydraulic or hydrocarbon binder. The procurement procedure used is: open call for tenders. It is subject to the provisions of articles L. 2124-2, R. 2124-2 1° and R. 2161-2 to R. 2161-5 of the Public Procurement Code. The framework agreement with maximum (see article 4 of the act of commitment) is entered into in application of articles L2125-1 1°, R. 2162-1 to R. 2162-6, R. 2162-13 and R. 2162-14 of the Public Procurement Code. It will give rise to the broadcast purchase orders. Services are regulated by unit prices. The maximum amount is 30,000,000.00 euro(s) excluding tax for all renewal periods, i.e. a total duration of 4 years. Each framework agreement will be allocated to a single operator economic. The services will be financed according to the following methods: Own resources Toulouse Métropole. Overall payment deadline of 30 days. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-11-28. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOWN HALL OF PONT-SAINT-ESPRIT. Summary: Study to Characterize the Runoff Hazard and Proposals for Protection Works. Description: In order to be able to protect the population, property and take risks into account in town planning, the commune of Pont-Saint-Esprit aims to characterize the risk of flooding by runoff, over the entire municipal territory, to propose a regulatory zoning to be integrated into the PLU and to propose risk reduction measures. This study, resulting from action 1.11 - Improve knowledge of the risk of flooding by runoff from PAPI3 Cèze, subsidized by the regional council and the State, must comply with the requirements of the PAPI 3 2021 specifications and the departmental doctrine on taking risks into account in town planning from 2018 validated by the prefect. She will also have to meet expectations regarding studies qualification of the runoff hazard by hydraulic modeling and flooding carried out under the departmental doctrine of Gard. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-12-03. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The purpose of the consultation is to carry out fauna-flora inventories as part of future work on the containment systems in the Metz sector. The mission is planned to start as soon as the contract is notified. So the holder must be ready to start the inventory from the beginning of the month from February 2026. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DEPARTMENT OF SEINE-SAINT-DENIS. Summary: Framework Agreement for Project Management of Public Space Development Operations. Description: This consultation concerns project management missions in application of Book IV of the Public Procurement Code (regulatory part) relating to the provisions specific to public contracts linked to public project management and project management. The content of each element of mission is that which appears in articles R2431-24 to R2431-31 of the Public Procurement Code and is specified in the specific technical clauses (C.C.T.P.). The missions concern the development of departmental streets, departmental public spaces and/or public spaces of departmental interest. These developments must be seen in coherence with existing or planned developments in adjoining public spaces in the community or under the project management of other partners (SGP, EPT, RATP, etc.). The proposed developments will mainly relate to infrastructure works and will integrate all departmental policies, particularly in terms of the environment: adaptation to climate change, carbon sobriety, preservation of biodiversity, greening of public spaces, preservation of resources, frugality and economy circular (reuse, reuse and recycling of materials). Proposals are expected on their capacity to accommodate plantations and/or integrate innovative developments in terms of sanitation, traffic regulation, fire management, etc. thus promoting uses new.... input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DEPARTMENT OF SEINE-SAINT-DENIS. Summary: Extension and Development Work at the Henri Iv College in Vaujours. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: PETR COUNTRY LOIR VALLEY. Summary: Carrying out the Revision of the Territorial Coherence Scheme (Scot) of the Petr Pays Vallee Du Loir in Scot-Air Energy Climate (Scot-Aec). Description: - In-depth territorial diagnosis integrating demographic, economic, environmental and energy issues. - Development and validation of multiple structuring documents (PAS, DOO, DAACL) compatible with the current regulatory framework. - Integration of dynamics linked to the transition ecological, climatic and digital, taking into account land sobriety trajectories (ZAN). - Evaluation and integration of the PCAET. - Organization of public consultations and participatory workshops with local stakeholders and residents. - Coordination and steering of actions, management documentary and communication. - Possibility of an optional tranche relating to the simplified modification of the SCoT in connection with the Climate and Resilience law and the ZAN trajectory. - Estimated duration of the mission: approximately 40 month. Published Date: 2025-11-03. Closing Date: 2025-12-08. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: COMMUNITY OF COMMUNITIES TERRES DE CHALOSSE. Summary: Intellectual Services Market Concerns the Development of the Intercommunal Local Urban Planning Plan Serving as a Local Housing Program (Plui-H) Terres De Chalosse. Description: The consultation is not broken down into batches. It includes a firm tranche including the development of the PLUi-H and an optional tranche 1 relating to the additional asset inventory, both treated at a global, fixed price. The services will give rise to a market unique. In view of the complex issues linked to the development of the PLUi-H (firm tranche) and the interdependence of the different phases of its development, it was deemed necessary to entrust the entire mission to a single economic operator or group, in order to ensure overall consistency of the project and optimization of resources. Variants are not authorized for the firm tranche (PLUi-H), but authorized for optional tranche 1 (additional asset inventory). this contract will be awarded to the candidate proposing the most economically advantageous offer based on of the following criteria: • the technical value: 60% • the price: 40% The maximum duration of the contract will be 48 (forty-eight) months, time for validation of the project management Understood.. Published Date: 2025-11-03. Closing Date: 2025-12-08. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: COMMUNITY OF COMMUNITIES TERRES DE CHALOSSE
